name: Hewlett Packard Limited
description:
Do you want public cloud agility and simplicity with on-premises security and control? Now you can have both with a hybrid Microsoft Azure cloud. Procure Microsoft® Azure® public cloud subscriptions through Hewlett Packard Enterprise, or host Azure consistent services in the security of your own data center with the HPE ProLiant for Microsoft Azure Stack solution. Regardless of the right mix public or private cloud you choose, HPE Operational Services can help optimize your Microsoft Azure hybrid environment.

Simplify and control adoption of the cloud in your enterprise
Modern cloud computing technology can simplify IT tremendously and deliver significant business benefits, but the complexity of yet another vendor, technology, language, and procedure, can be daunting. Similarly. Some organizations have specific security, compliance, performance, and cost requirements that limit their use of the public cloud. A hybrid strategy is the way to go, but only if it’s simple and secure. 

HPE and Microsoft are working closely to empower customers through the Microsoft Azure hybrid cloud. We’re enabling enterprises to operate workloads that belong in the cloud and leverage PaaS for cloud native app development. At the same time, we’re helping you gain Azure service consistency along with on-premises security and control with the HPE ProLiant for Microsoft Azure Stack platform. Leveraging HPE Pointnext expertise, services, and global support, we can help you to find the right mix of public and private cloud, strategically deploy cloud services, simplify hybrid IT operations, and achieve best use of your Microsoft Azure hybrid cloud solution. 

Operational Services for Microsoft Azure from HPE Pointnext can help you achieve these benefits—and enhance your overall experience with the technology. 

Learn more at: hpe.com/services/datacentercare

Please email LicensingSolutions@hpe.com for queries regarding CSP pricing and quoting

name: Numerical Algorithms Group Ltd
description:
NAG is the leading international provider of trusted impartial expertise and experience in both the technical and business aspects of High Performance Computing (HPC) and Cloud.

We help customers in all sectors internationally to:
- Value models: understand how cloud could deliver value for them, including scale, flexibility, performance, and more.

- Port, tune and benchmark applications for the cloud.
- Understand the Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) aspects of using the cloud.
- Provide support for users in the cloud (especially, application and user support, sometimes called 'RSE' type support).

- Cloud migration: full migration, or optimal blend of combination of on-premises and cloud
- Select the most appropriate Azure solution, e.g., Azure Batch, Azure CycleCloud, …
- Migrate from Windows to Linux on Azure

APPLICATIONS SUR MESURE
Applications web & mobiles, conception technique, architecture.

DES PARTENAIRES, PAS DE CLIENTS
La proximité, l'écoute, la réactivité sont des valeurs essentielles qui reflètent au travers de tous nos projets. Nous avons la volonté de mettre en place un véritable partenariat à long terme, car votre projet nous le vivons avec vous, de bout en bout.

LA TRANSPARENCE
Tout projet amène son lot d'inattendus et nous en sommes conscients. Notre méthodologie projet interactive nous permet de localiser rapidement tout point de blocage pour étudier ensemble les solutions possibles et continuer dʼavancer dans le projet.

UN ACCOMPAGNEMENT SANS DÉPENDANCE
Vous êtes propriétaire de toutes les sources et modules développés par nos équipes. Nous les mettons à votre disposition sur simple demande, vous garantissant ainsi une liberté d'accompagnement.

DES CHOIX TECHNOLOGIQUES MESURÉS 
Toutes les technologies que nous utilisons ont été approuvées par les standards du marché et leur communauté de développement associée. Cʼest aussi sur le plan technologique que se fait lʼaccompagnement sans dépendance.

name: NEXUS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
description:
Nexus Technologies Inc. was incorporated in December 1994 with a vision to create a professionally run company that delivers real business benefits to its clients through leading technologies. Today, Nexus is proud to be a prominent force in the Philippine IT industry, having carved a niche as the systems integrator and corporate IT reseller of choice of some of the Philippines' top corporations. It has successfully forged long-term client partnerships anchored by a keen understanding that technology plays a pivotal role in the delivery and the achievement of an organization's business goals.
 
Nexus is ably steered by the reputable industry experience and histories of its founders, Juan Chua, Alfonso Olondriz, and Mario Arroyo. The Nexus leadership makes it a fundamental practice to hire the best people in the industry and takes under its wings new blood with potential. As a result, the 200-strong company maintains a vibrant culture that is always open to new ideas and believes in the ability of its people to help move the business.
Flexibility and openness to change are among the strongest qualities of Nexus as a company. These are reflected on the various aspects of its business- from the management and the people, to the choice of solutions and quality of customer support.
 
Nexus maintains a strong network of IT solutions providers culled carefully from a genuine passion to provide solutions that offer genuine business advantage. The company has never been afraid to actively push new products. A local pioneer in solutions-based reselling, Nexus carried Hewlett-Packard and Microsoft back when they were new players in the server market. It approaches the business today with the same bravado.
Veering away from products that have been too commodified, Nexus constantly strives for the most effective mix of value and pricing in its broad range of offerings.
 
Beyond the sale, the company makes sure to stay with its customers through to implementation, ensuring service and support that enable customers to get the most returns from their investments.
 
Nexus maintains its focus as a corporate IT reseller and systems integrator while diversifying its IT services and product offerings. To further boost its value as a company to its partners-clients, principals, and stakeholders-Nexus started venturing into IT companies with different core businesses.

•	Wide industry expertise addressing Telecoms, Media & Technology, Aerospace, Automotive, Rail, Defence, Energy, Financial Services, and Public Sector

The deployment of strategic portfolio management and reporting solutions is a key service offering within MI-GSO | PCUBED.  We have the skilled resources and the experience to deliver the most complex, business wide project and portfolio management implementations. In addition to this, one of our key differentiators is that we bring process best practices to manage successful delivery and change management tools and expertise to ensure that the new solution is embedded and adopted within the client organisation and delivers the sustained business benefits identified. 

With over 1,200 Microsoft Project and Portfolio Management deployments globally, MI-GSO | PCUBED has more experience of implementing Microsoft Project and Portfolio Management Solutions than any other consultancies. 
MI-GSO | PCUBED have been a Global Microsoft partner for several years and have been both winner and finalist of the Microsoft Partner of the Year awards. 

As Managed Partner we are better equipped than any other companies to help our clients navigate the vast structure that is the Microsoft Corporation. This goes well beyond simply being up-to-date on policies and products. It also means their projects will run more quickly and smoothly because we have a direct line to support channels.

This is delivered through a full range of consulting services, tailored to match an organisation's current capability maturity level.

APPLICATIONS SUR MESURE
Applications web & mobiles, conception technique, architecture. 

INGÉNIERIE SYSTÈME & RÉSEAUX
Hébergement, infogérance, messagerie professionnelle, sécurité des systèmes, cloud privé & public. 

TÉLÉPHONIE
Déploiement de téléphonie et voix sur IP 

SÉCURITÉ
Alarme, télésurveillance, protection des locaux 



Contacter ODIWI, c'est faire un choix de valeurs également : 

DES PARTENAIRES, PAS DE CLIENTS
La proximité, l'écoute, la réactivité sont des valeurs essentielles qui reflètent au travers de tous nos projets. Nous avons la volonté de mettre en place un véritable partenariat à long terme, car votre projet nous le vivons avec vous, de bout en bout.

LA TRANSPARENCE
Tout projet amène son lot d'inattendus et nous en sommes conscients. Notre méthodologie projet interactive nous permet de localiser rapidement tout point de blocage pour étudier ensemble les solutions possibles et continuer dʼavancer dans le projet.

UN ACCOMPAGNEMENT SANS DÉPENDANCE
Vous êtes propriétaire de toutes les sources et modules développés par nos équipes. Nous les mettons à votre disposition sur simple demande, vous garantissant ainsi une liberté d'accompagnement.

DES CHOIX TECHNOLOGIQUES MESURÉS

name: EntServ UK Limited

DXC Technology is the world's leading independent, end-to-end IT services company, serving nearly 6,000 private and public-sector clients from a diverse array of industries across 70 countries. Microsoft and DXC have been strategic partners for more than 30 years. Together, we lead clients on their digital transformation journeys by delivering solutions that are intelligent, modern and secure.  Our global network of 20,000 Microsoft certified and trained specialists leverage the Microsoft platform to build connections between people, data and processes that help clients gain the insights, agility, control and security they need to confidently navigate the evolving digital landscape. DXC offerings are differentiated to address complex enterprise needs across a wide array of environments and industries, including healthcare, retail, manufacturing, financial services and more. 

Microsoft has repeatedly recognized the leadership of DXC and DXC companies through numerous awards, including:
•	Worldwide Productivity Partner of the Year
•	Dynamics Global Services Partner of the Year
•	Dynamics Industry Partner of the Year - Healthcare

Overall, DXC Technology has reached the status of Gold recognition by exhibiting increased levels of real world experience and expertise through projects that were independently verified by Microsoft.

DXC Technology is recognized among the best corporate citizens globally.

name: KINETIC IT PTY LTD
description:
Kinetic IT is a leading Australian-owned provider of enterprise-class ICT solutions. We partner with some of our nation’s most important organisations, helping them deliver essential services relied upon by our communities including education, law enforcement, defence, emergency, utilities and transport. Our customers are private and public-sector organisations seeking high quality solutions and efficient service delivery within some of the largest and most complex environments in the country. Key to our success is proven experience and capability, a commitment to best-practice methodologies and a refreshing penchant for flexibility and customer focus.
Our core lines of business are:

BUSINESS AND DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
Customers choose Transform services when desiring widespread business, cultural and experiential change. The breadth of our transformation services spans a range of technology and business areas, including driving adoption of mobile and field-based technologies, HR enablement, digital workspaces, robotic processes, Internet-of-Things deployments, advanced intelligence and data visualisation solutions.

MANAGED ENTERPRISE TECHNOLOGY
Kinetic IT managed service offerings include service desk, application support, infrastructure management, hybrid and native cloud, network management, data centres, lifecycle asset management and enterprise mobility. Our dedicated resourcing model and localised management structure enables customers to benefit from agile service delivery that adapts and aligns with evolving needs and environments.

CYBER INFORMATION AND SECURITY
Kinetic IT PROTECT+ represents the next phase in cyber security innovation. Our PROTECT+ Threat Intelligence and Response services are delivered through our world-class WA-based Security Operations Centre (SOC). The PROTECT+ security consulting team offers specialist threat assessments and attack modelling, incident response readiness assessments, tabletop scenario planning and execution, as well as all guidance and assistance on security strategy, policy, process, architecture and security awareness training for customers.

ADVISORY AND CONSULTING
Kinetic IT offers mature business and technology Advisory and Consulting capabilities, bringing industry best practice to our customers’ organisations.  Leveraging deep insight, our advisory and consulting services include comprehensive organisational assessments, technology strategy advice, and tried-and-tested integrated methodologies.

Dank klarem Branchenfokus und spezifisch auf diese Bedürfnisse ausgerichtetem Angebotsportfolio befähigt die Inventx ihre Kunden für die kontinuierliche digitale Transformation ihrer Geschäftsmodelle. Mit der ix.Cloud sowie der ix.OpenFinancePlattform stellt Inventx zudem standardisierte und Compliance-gerechte Lösungen bereit, die die kundenseitige Flexibilität und Innovationskraft messbar erhöhen.

Innovation, Interaction, Swissness - Inventx is the Swiss IT and digitalization partner for leading financial and insurance service providers. At the locations in Chur, Zurich Airport and St. Gallen, the approximately 300 employees live the proximity to the customer. Inventx stands for the highest quality and security thinking as well as secure data storage in Switzerland - also thanks to three own data centers. The independent and owner-managed IT company designs, operates and integrates application, IT and cloud solutions for well-known customers in the finance and insurance industry. name: Seyfor Slovensko, a.s.
description:
As part of the holding company Solitea, a.s., we are a strong player in the European information and communication technology solutions market. You will find our branches in five Central European countries (Slovakia, Czech Republic, Austria, Germany and Poland) and three Balkan countries (Slovenia, Croatia, and Serbia). We are a rapidly growing company with 1,200 employees and we currently serve over 250,000 customers. Our total annual turnover today exceeds 75 million EUR.

On the Czech-Slovak market we are a major partner of Microsoft in business information systems and software applications, namely Dynamics 365, Power Platform and Microsoft 365.

Thanks to our almost 30-year history on the market, we know all the risks and threats of local as well as global implementations projects. We help our customers to overcome many challenges on the way, so they can master their digital transformation into a successful modern company. And we proceed further to build a strong partnership with our customers, so they always can rely on us.

Historically, we focused on well-known ERP systems Navision and Axapta, and nowadays we still are loyal to these technologies, which evolved themselves into cutting-edge solutions labeled as Dynamics 365. Through implementations experiences from more than 15 countries of the world, we have got the know-how and highly professional staff in the fields of software development, solution modernization, process automation, and effective support providing.

We use Microsoft Power Platform to build seamless workflow automation. The wide range of Microsoft 365 applications help our customers with effective communication, content creation, and cooperation. In addition, for all scenarios of implementation of Microsoft solutions, we can provide you with cloud, on-premises as well as hybrid infrastructure.

Founded in 2013, Resello formally joined Pax8 as of July of 2021 and will continue to operate as their Pan-European distributor going forward. Together our mission is to be the world’s favorite marketplace for technology professionals to buy cloud products.

name: JourneyTEAM, LLC
description:
We are a technology services firm, software house, and creative studio - all in one - specializing in Dynamics 365. We have been delivering outstanding results for our customers with the Dynamics platform since its inception. We are a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, and have been for more than 20 years.

Our expressive culture inspires our team of Dynamics experts and creative professionals to define and refine solutions that are as unique as the needs of your business. We provide a robust delivery methodology that ensures 100% user adoption and maximum return on your investment in Dynamics 365.

Our focus is on our customers, pushing one another to be the very best we can be, and having a healthy dose of fun along the way. After all, life is too short to do boring stuff with boring tech, so we enjoy keeping things lively, expressing proven methods, and adding to our library of 20 plus years’ worth of successful projects, patterns, and solutions.  

Contact us today to discuss how Dynamics 365 can be put to work for you!

name: Collective Insights Consulting
description:
Collective Insights is a Microsoft Solutions Partner with extensive capabilities in Security, Modern Work, Infrastructure, and Data & AI. We have specializations in Cloud Security, Identity and Access Management, Information Protection and Governance, Threat Protection, and Adoption & Change Management.

We thoughtfully plan and drive our clients’ adoption of Microsoft solutions to modernize, secure and migrate on-premises, legacy technology to Microsoft Cloud capabilities.

We implement Microsoft business solutions like Defender, Entra, and Purview, and Copilot to secure Microsoft 365 and Azure to keep business applications safe and increase cloud productivity in the modern work environment. 

In 2021, Microsoft recognized Collective Insights as a Finalist for the 20/20 Azure Security Deployment Partner of the Year. We help our clients make the most of their technology investments, including solutions that accelerate and secure the way they do business. 

Choose Collective Insights as your trusted services delivery partner for a fortified technology adoption future. We make sure you succeed by using our proven methodologies that drive successful organization change, which lead to faster adoption and usage. We do not just create strategies — we work together to ensure the long-term success of your business.

name: Aranda Software Corporation
description:
Somos la compañía líder en soluciones de Gestión de IT en Latinoamérica

Respaldados por una trayectoria de más de 18 años, ofrecemos soluciones disruptivas para la gestión de servicios que facilitan a las empresas su incremento en la productividad, a través de software que cumple con los más altos estándares de calidad.

name: ANDigital LTD
description:
AND Digital is on a mission to close the world’s digital skills gap. 

To do that, they accelerate the digital capabilities of ambitious organisations, blending tech craft skills and product expertise with an award-winning approach to talent development. This means their clients can launch digital products and build high performing digital teams faster today, whilst simultaneously developing the critical capabilities they need to fuel their digital journey tomorrow.

Ranked 10th nationally in The Sunday Times 100 Best Companies, AND Digital is also rated as one of The Next Web’s Top 5 fastest growing UK tech companies. AND Digital operates through an innovative series of nimble, Agile ‘Clubs’ across the UK in Birmingham, Bristol, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Halifax, Leeds, London, Manchester, Reading and Warrington - offering a flexible and highly responsive service to clients.

With a growing team of experts, AND is the go-to digital enablement partner for a diverse range of global organisations.

Vi leverer skybasert IT Infrastruktur, Rådgivning og konsulenttjenester, alltid med fokus på dine forretningsbehov.

name: Twyzer B.V.
description:
Twyzer specializes in smart, data-driven solutions on the Microsoft Azure Platform. By leveraging the strengths of Azure, we fully focus on delivering added value to our customers. We utilize Platform as a Service (PaaS) and Software as a Service (SaaS) offerings from Azure to provide a wide range of solutions, from low-code to full-code.

Our solutions include smart data applications with Microsoft Fabric, Azure AI Services, OpenAI, PowerBI, Azure Integration Services, and containerization. These services enable companies to work efficiently and data-driven, innovate, and grow in an increasingly digital world.

name: Cloud4C Services FZ LLC
description:
Cloud4C is a mission-critical application focused managed services company with factory-based approach to drive digital transformations on Azure platform. Our managed services and the process frameworks are innovative and go beyond ITIL and COBIT frameworks. Cloud4C has a presence across 25 countries and is serving 4000+ enterprises across the globe with 60 of Fortune 500 companies and 80+ enterprises with over $1Bn revenue.

Cloud4C is an Azure Expert MSP with advanced specializations for Modernization of Web Applications to Microsoft Azure, SAP on Azure and Windows Server and SQL Server Migrations. Our Gold competencies include Application Development, Data Analytics, Security and DevOps. Cloud4C is a major SAP global provider for SAP S/4 HANA Cloud managing over 2200+ TB of HANA across cloud platforms and is certified for DevOps, SAP Hosting, Application Management Services, Cloud Services and HANA Operations Services. Cloud4C is also specialized in providing solutions to industry verticals like Banking and managing production workloads of Core banking as well on various cloud platforms and helping banks in their digital transformation.
With comprehensive cloud security framework comprising 40+ security controls, pre-met compliances with leading industry regulations, Cloud4C offers specialized cloud solutions across industry verticals with a single SLA up to application level.  We help customers map the controls to security frameworks, standards and certifications (PCI DSS, MAS etc) We provide Managed Security Services following Security Design Philosophy with Zero Trust architectures


Cloud4C has a broad range of managed and professional services including cloud advisory, migration, automation, RPA and managed services, supported by strong next-gen security solutions. We provide audit ready infrastructure to every industry vertical across geographies leveraging 25 CoEs and SOCs. Perfecting migration factory frameworks, we have been recognized to deliver the fastest path to value, with cost optimization at the core. Cloud4C provides the solutions which are compliant to the necessary regions and industry verticals like IRAP, RBI, NESA, SAMA, MAS etc. Cloud4C also supports application modernization through containerization, DevOps, CI/CD and serverless computing. Cloud4C also offers Managed Disaster Recovery as a Service (DRaaS) with zero RTO/RPO

name: New Charter Technologies Inc
description:
At New Charter, we’re committed to building a caliber of business that the industry hasn’t yet seen. Through innovation, collaboration, and strategic execution, we deliver best-in-class solutions to propel our clients into the digital world.

The team is composed of industry-leading, top quartile MSPs that share a common set of cultural values and business objectives. New Charter is setting the standard of excellence in the industry by executing a business model that strengthens and elevates the performance of the entire group as a whole.

New Charter is at the high end of financial performance and operational maturity. Through collaboration, sharing of best practices, and taking advantage of scale opportunities, the businesses perform at an even higher level.

name: IT Era
description:

name: Howell Technology Group Ltd

Your people-first technology partner.

Our work isn't limited to those industries, though. Ambitious businesses that are excited about growing and improving their digital processes are some of our favourite clients.

integrationWorks

integrationWorks
we make integration work for you

IntegrationWorks GmbH is a consulting company based in Berlin, Düsseldorf, Munich and Bangkok. In addition to classic software development in an object-oriented environment and the creation of individual software for companies, we have specialized in the integration of complex software systems.

Specialized in the integration of interfaces with the tools IBM Integration Bus and Websphere MQ and the development of microservices, we cover a rapidly growing sector in IT with our experts.

name: ITsavvy
description:
ITsavvy is one of a select number of providers worldwide that have the unique status of Microsoft Direct Cloud Solutions Provider (CSP) for commercial and enterprise organizations, a status that is limited to Microsoft’s top Cloud partners globally. In addition, ITsavvy holds specialized authorizations as Microsoft CSP for US Government and Education. description:
Mazik Global is an experienced and visionary IT solution development and implementation company. A Microsoft Gold Partner and key development partner in Azure cloud solutions. Mazik is a proud multi-year recipient of Microsoft’s Dynamics President’s Club award, an honor that highlights the high satisfaction of their customers. Since its inception, Mazik has been recognized for exceptional customer service, technology capabilities, and extensive industry knowledge. With a deep understanding of the technology industry, Mazik has expertise in successfully implementing innovative solutions in organizations around the world.

As a key Microsoft Gold Partner, we continue to develop industry-specific mobile and cloud-ready apps that empower users and companies to connect all of their processes in one integrated system, creating one experience or One Microsoft Story. name: Evozon Systems
description:
With over 17 years of experience and more than 500 professionals, we’ve helped dozens of enterprises achieve their digital goals. Either by starting early in the digitization phase or by getting involved later on in the growth stage, we become an integral part of our clients’ business.
 
As end to end software development providers, we cover various industries while maintaining a consistent approach to deliver top notch solutions. We work successfully with our clients either by incubating teams and covering everything from top to bottom or by augmenting their own team and acting as an extension of their business, helping them scale with a bit more firepower. No matter the business model, our policy is to build products and support businesses, not just provide lines of code. In the end, we’re more than providers or developers. We’re your partner in building the right solution for your business.

Folio3 provides full-range services related to Microsoft Dynamics 365, AX, NAV, Business Central, F&O, and more. The range of services includes:

name: NEXUS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
description:
Nexus Technologies Inc. was incorporated in December 1994 with a vision to create a professionally run company that delivers real business benefits to its clients through leading technologies. Today, Nexus is proud to be a prominent force in the Philippine IT industry, having carved a niche as the systems integrator and corporate IT reseller of choice of some of the Philippines' top corporations. It has successfully forged long-term client partnerships anchored by a keen understanding that technology plays a pivotal role in the delivery and the achievement of an organization's business goals.
 
Nexus is ably steered by the reputable industry experience and histories of its founders, Juan Chua, Alfonso Olondriz, and Mario Arroyo. The Nexus leadership makes it a fundamental practice to hire the best people in the industry and takes under its wings new blood with potential. As a result, the 200-strong company maintains a vibrant culture that is always open to new ideas and believes in the ability of its people to help move the business.
Flexibility and openness to change are among the strongest qualities of Nexus as a company. These are reflected on the various aspects of its business- from the management and the people, to the choice of solutions and quality of customer support.
 
Nexus maintains a strong network of IT solutions providers culled carefully from a genuine passion to provide solutions that offer genuine business advantage. The company has never been afraid to actively push new products. A local pioneer in solutions-based reselling, Nexus carried Hewlett-Packard and Microsoft back when they were new players in the server market. It approaches the business today with the same bravado.
Veering away from products that have been too commodified, Nexus constantly strives for the most effective mix of value and pricing in its broad range of offerings.
 
Beyond the sale, the company makes sure to stay with its customers through to implementation, ensuring service and support that enable customers to get the most returns from their investments.
 
Nexus maintains its focus as a corporate IT reseller and systems integrator while diversifying its IT services and product offerings. To further boost its value as a company to its partners-clients, principals, and stakeholders-Nexus started venturing into IT companies with different core businesses.

name: MiGSO-PCUBED
description:
Established in 1994, MI-GSO | PCUBED is a leading independent global consulting organization uniquely focused on project, program, portfolio and change management. MI-GSO | PCUBED successfully delivers innovation and business transformations for our clients by helping them easily manage their complex initiatives while at the same time growing their internal capabilities. Our strengths in Portfolio, programme, project and change management gives a capability of: 
•	Over 1,200 expert Consultants 
•	32 offices around the globe covering operations in Europe, North America, Asia and Australia
•	Wide industry expertise addressing Telecoms, Media & Technology, Aerospace, Automotive, Rail, Defence, Energy, Financial Services, and Public Sector

The deployment of strategic portfolio management and reporting solutions is a key service offering within MI-GSO | PCUBED.  We have the skilled resources and the experience to deliver the most complex, business wide project and portfolio management implementations. In addition to this, one of our key differentiators is that we bring process best practices to manage successful delivery and change management tools and expertise to ensure that the new solution is embedded and adopted within the client organisation and delivers the sustained business benefits identified. 

With over 1,200 Microsoft Project and Portfolio Management deployments globally, MI-GSO | PCUBED has more experience of implementing Microsoft Project and Portfolio Management Solutions than any other consultancies. 
MI-GSO | PCUBED have been a Global Microsoft partner for several years and have been both winner and finalist of the Microsoft Partner of the Year awards. 

As Managed Partner we are better equipped than any other companies to help our clients navigate the vast structure that is the Microsoft Corporation. This goes well beyond simply being up-to-date on policies and products. It also means their projects will run more quickly and smoothly because we have a direct line to support channels. 

MI-GSO | PCUBED provides organisations with a number of flexible technology based solutions uniquely designed to address their Strategic Portfolio Management and Reporting challenges. This is delivered through a full range of consulting services, tailored to match an organisation's current capability maturity level.

description:
Con más de 35 años de experiencia en el Sector Informático y de las Telecomunicaciones, aportamos valor en nuestros clientes mediante tecnologías y herramientas digitales avanzadas que impulsan su productividad y competitividad. Acompañamos a nuestros clientes en la Transformación Digital de sus procesos estratégicos de negocio. 
Somos un equipo comprometido y multidisciplinar integrado por grandes profesionales que trabajan poniendo pasión a todo lo que hacen para ofrecer las mejores soluciones tecnológicas en múltiples áreas (estrategia digital, comercio electrónico, marketing digital, digitalización de procesos, ciberseguridad, infraestructura tecnológica it, migración cloud, analítica de negocio y talento digital) en actividades de la industria manufacturera, química, alimentación y agroalimentaria, distribución, servicios, asesorías y despachos profesionales. 
Ayudamos, asesoramos y nos involucramos con sus intereses de Marketing Digital. Contamos con una alta especialización en Inbound Marketing y los diferentes enfoques estratégicos de la metodología (marketing de contenidos, promoción en redes sociales, marketing conversacional, estrategia de conversión y nutrición de leads). Así como, sus aplicaciones básicas: CRM, eMail Marketing y Automatización de Marketing. 
Clavei es Partner Gold de Wolters Kluwer (referente en el sector de soluciones para recursos humanos, asesorías y despachos profesionales), PrestaShop Certified Gold Partner (plataforma líder de comercio electrónico), Clientify Partner (plataforma de automatización de marketing y ventas), único Partner Oficial Sur de España de Tableau (herramienta líder de análisis de negocio), principales Certificaciones en Ciberseguridad, Cloud Computing e IT, Partner Gold de Microsoft, hp Preferred Partner, ESET Partner (Protección Antivirus y soluciones de seguridad) y Authorized reseller Ultimaker (referente en impresoras 3D de alta calidad, software, materiales y soporte).
